languages-in: One language known by its creator
T1D-in: While the shrub remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub.
T2D-in: The living wood sapling regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point
A1D-in: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4-1 slashing damage.
A2D-in: The living wood sapling begins to glow bright green as it restores itself, regaining 1d8+4 hit points.
